import{useUnsupportedTokens}from'./Tokens';export function useIsTransactionUnsupported(currencyIn,currencyOut){const unsupportedToken=useUnsupportedTokens();const tokenIn=currencyIn;const tokenOut=currencyOut;// if unsupported list loaded & either token on list, mark as unsupported
if(unsupportedToken){if(tokenIn&&Object.keys(unsupportedToken).includes(tokenIn.address)){return true;}if(tokenOut&&Object.keys(unsupportedToken).includes(tokenOut.address)){return true;}}return false;}
